text: Miklós Szabó (2 September 1938 - 10 October 2019) was a Hungarian sports shooter. He competed in the 300 metre rifle, three positions event at the 1960 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Hungarian male sport shooters Category:Olympic shooters of Hungary Category:Shooters at the 1960 Summer Olympics Category:People from Szolnok
title: Miklós Szabó (sport shooter)
